casebody.data:
No. 10-6520. Ernest Brim, aka Bernard Horne, Petitioner v. Aristedes W. Zavares, Executive Director, Colorado Department of Corrections, et al. 562 U.S. 1015, 131 S. Ct. 533,

178 L. Ed. 2d 392,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 8565, November 1, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 371 Fed. Appx. 885.
